definition: Joan of Arc (1412-1431), French heroine and liberator, executed as a witch by the Burgundians and English

sentences.english: Objective To study in vitro growth inhibitory effect of LIA on bacteria.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討女貞子體外抑菌作用。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of the treatment using privet trees fresh leaves on canker in mouth.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較常規治療與女貞子鮮葉治療口腔潰瘍的療效。

sentences.english: Aim To provide evidence for quality evaluation of the crude drug, the fruits of Ligustrum lucidum.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲中藥材女貞子的質量評價提供依據。

sentences.english: These do not match with north surrey and privet drive as we know it.
sentences.chinese: 這些都不符合我們所知道的北薩里郡及女貞路。

sentences.english: The main effective ingredient in Fructrus Ligustri Lucidi is Oleanolic acid.
sentences.chinese: 齊墩果酸是女貞子中的主要有效成分。

sentences.english: So great was his discomfort that he almost forgot to take a last glimpse of number four, Privet Drive;
sentences.chinese: 他太難受了，幾乎忘了最後再看一眼女貞路四號。

sentences.english: Conclusion LIA has significant in vitro effect of growth…
sentences.chinese: 結論女貞子在體外有明顯的抑菌作用。

sentences.english: Privet Drive is on the outskirts of what I would call a " satellite" town to London.
sentences.chinese: 女貞路是在我把它稱之爲倫敦的“衛星城”的邊緣。

sentences.english: A street in Little Whinging, intersecting Privet Drive.
sentences.chinese: 小圍金路上的一條街，與女貞路交界。

sentences.english: But where EXACTLY is Little Whinging and Privet Drive?
sentences.chinese: 但小惠金區和女貞路到底在哪兒啊？

sentences.english: Or did he come and go between the Malfoy mansion and Privet Drive every day?
sentences.chinese: 要麼就是他每天在馬爾夫大宅和女貞路之間來回奔走？

sentences.english: He looked around, the landing of number four, Privet Drive, was deserted.
sentences.chinese: 他看了看周圍，四號出口，女貞路，沒有人。

sentences.english: The essay studied the extraction of red pigment from the fruits of glossy privet and its physicochemical properties.
sentences.chinese: 對女貞果紅色素的提取及性質進行了研究。

definition: Yushu county level city in Changchun 長春|长春, Jilin
to be shaded or concealed by foliage/to conceal/hidden/covert/shade (of a tree)
mulberry tree, with leaves used to feed silkworms
pattra palm tree (Corypha umbraculifera), whose leaves were used as paper substitute for Buddhist sutras
indigo woad root/root of Isatis tinctoria (used in TCM)
Chinese foxglove (Rehmannia glutinosa), its rhizome used in TCM
